title: Bug 108975Visibility Toggle Chart Interactivity BPS 37
description: Bug 108975Visibility Toggle Chart Interactivity BPS 37 This is a point feature of BPS37 (http://www.eclipse.org/birt/wiki/index.php?n=BPS.BPS37)This feature covers the ability to toggle the visibility of chart elements.The SVG, SWT and Swing renderer should support this feature.The following is a use case.A line chart consisting of two datasets is displayed in an html page using theSVG renderer. The user has the ability to select a legend item to toggle thevisibility of the associated dataset in the plot area.
